Summary: flew slowly from southwest to nartheast
divs: Sighting Detailsi was out with my dog and noticed a rumbling sound , i looked around behind me and saw a triangled shaped object in between me and the moon, i noticed it had 3 lights on it , 1 in the front and 1 on each corner , there was a red pulsating light in the middle .. it was going slower than normal aircraft.. i watched it go out of sight towards the north east
